org.flowvisor.ofswitch

Class TopologyConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flowvisor.ofswitch.TopologyConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FVSendMsg, FVEventHandler

    public class TopologyConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements FVEventHandler, FVSendMsg
    Divide ports on a switch in to "slowPorts" and "fastPorts" send topology discovery probes the fastPorts more often then slowports if we get an lldp message on a port, make it a fast port
    Author:
    capveg

      • handleEvent

        public void handleEvent(FVEvent e)
                 throws UnhandledEvent
        Description copied from interface: FVEventHandler
        Pass a message to this Handler. If the dst is in the same thread context as the caller, the message is processed immediately (blocking) Else, the message is queued and processed later (non-blocking) If sender is null, the message is always queued
        Specified by:
